meanings.definition: A person or organization dedicated to combating alcoholism.
meanings.sent1: The antialcoholism advocate tirelessly worked to provide support for individuals struggling with alcohol addiction.
meanings.sent2: The antialcoholism center offered counseling services and resources for those seeking help.
meanings.sent3: The antialcoholism mascot, a friendly bear named Sober Sam, encouraged kids to make healthy choices.
meanings.sent4: She saw the antialcoholism organization as a beacon of light in the darkness of addiction.
meanings.sent5: The annual antialcoholism walkathon brought together hundreds of supporters in the fight against alcoholism.
